company.name: PixelPerfect Studios
company.description: PixelPerfect Studios offers professional photography services for events, commercials, and personal projects, capturing moments with artistic precision.

services.name: Wedding Photography
services.description: Capture your special day with stunning, high-resolution wedding photography.

services.name: Corporate Photography
services.description: Professional headshots, event coverage, and brand photography for businesses.

services.name: Portrait Photography
services.description: Personalized portrait sessions for individuals, families, and models.

services.name: Aerial & Drone Photography
services.description: High-quality drone photography and videography for real estate, events, and landscapes.

services.name: Portrait Sessions
services.description: Professional portrait photography for individuals, families, and groups.

faq.question: How far in advance should I book a wedding photographer?
faq.answer: We recommend booking 8-12 months in advance for wedding photography, especially for peak season dates.

faq.question: Do you provide the raw image files?
faq.answer: We provide professionally edited high-resolution images. Raw files are not included in our packages but can be purchased separately.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: Deposits are non-refundable. Cancellations within 30 days of the event forfeit 50% of the total fee.

faq.question: Do you provide international photography services?
faq.answer: Yes, we are available for international travel upon request.

faq.question: What photography equipment do you use?
faq.answer: We use top-tier cameras, lenses, and lighting equipment, including Canon, Sony, and Nikon professional gear.

faq.question: Can I request custom photo editing?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer professional retouching and editing services tailored to your needs.

faq.question: Do you offer videography services?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide high-quality video coverage for weddings, commercials, and events.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: Cancellations must be made at least 72 hours in advance for a full refund.

faq.question: Do you provide drone photography?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer drone coverage for aerial shots, subject to weather conditions.

faq.question: How long does it take to receive edited photos?
faq.answer: Typically, we deliver fully edited photos within 5-7 business days.

faq.question: Can I book a photoshoot online?
faq.answer: Yes, you can schedule your session through our website or by contacting us directly.

contact.hq_address: Creative Studios, New York City, USA
